main event: A civilian observed a light in flight over Toledo, Ohio on 15 August 1965.
interesting points: The object was brighter than the brightest star and changed direction suddenly,The sighting lasted for 15 minutes,The observer used binoculars to see the object clearly,The object was described as a dirty smudgy white with no distinct shape,Estimated speed of the object was 85-100 mph.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: Civilian observer in the backyard of a residence
